scripts.setup: make install && [ -f "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/LinkedinSC/backend/.env" ] && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/LinkedinSC/backend/.env" LinkedinSC/backend/.env; [ -f "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/LinkedinSC/frontend/.env.local" ] && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/LinkedinSC/frontend/.env.local" LinkedinSC/frontend/.env.local || true
scripts.archive: make clean; rm -rf LinkedinSC/frontend/.next LinkedinSC/backend/__pycache__ 2>/dev/null || true
